data.text: Me mma, montie me, montie agya nkyerɛkyerɛ;
Mema mo adenim a ɛkɔ anim,
Meyɛ ɔbabanin wɔ mʼagya fie,
ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ me sɛ,
Nya nyansa, nya nteaseɛ;
Nnya nyansa hɔ, na ɛbɛbɔ wo ho ban;
Nyansa boro biribiara so; enti hwehwɛ nyansa.
Di no nni na ɛbɛpagya wo;
Ɔde nkonimdie nhwiren hankra bɛgu wo tiri so
Me ba, tie na fa deɛ meka no,
Mɛkyerɛ wo nyansakwan
Sɛ wonante a, wʼanammɔntuo bɛkɔ yɛɛ
Di nkyerɛkyerɛ so; na nnyaa mu
Ntu wo nan nsi amumuyɛfoɔ kwan so
Kwati no, ntu kwan mfa so;
Ɛfiri sɛ wɔntumi nna kɔsi sɛ wɔbɛyɛ bɔne;
Amumuyɛsɛm yɛ wɔn aduane,
Teneneefoɔ kwan te sɛ adekyeɛ hann a ɛdi ɛkan,
Nanso, amumuyɛfoɔ kwan te sɛ esum kabii;
Me ba, yɛ aso ma deɛ meka;
Mma ɛmfiri wʼani so,
ɛfiri sɛ, ɛyɛ nkwa ma wɔn a wɔhunu
Ne nyinaa akyi, bɔ wʼakoma ho ban,
Mma akontonkyesɛm mfiri wʼano;
Hwɛ wʼanim tee,
Bɔ ɛkwan tamaa ma wo nan
Mmane mfa nifa anaa benkum;
